function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overreliance on active heating and cooling systems","Impact":"Increased indoor air contamination and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Encourage natural ventilation and operable windows to reduce reliance on active systems","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, automated window actuators","People":"Building residents, visitors, and occupants","Owner":"Building management and maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation in balconies","Impact":"Reduced indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Balcony design with proper ventilation features and access to fresh air","Technologies":"Balcony ventilation systems, natural ventilation design principles","People":"Residents and visitors using balconies","Owner":"Building developers and architects"},{"Description":"Uncontrolled socialization on balconies","Impact":"Increased risk of close-contact transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Establish guidelines for balcony usage and promote social distancing measures","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, community engagement apps for communication","People":"Building residents and neighbors","Owner":"Building management and homeowners' association"}]}
